title: OCE IS SO BAD PLEASE FIX NA PING FROM AUSTRALIA
body:
IM SO SICK OF BEING PUT WITH PLAYERS THAT DON'T CARE. I UNDERSTAND THAT ITS PRESEASON, BUT ITS NOT FUCKING FUN PLAYING WITH A GROUP OF MONKEYS, ESPECIALLY A DUO QUEUE THAT COMES IN TO "HAVE FUN" EVEN IF IT MEANS WASTING TIME.

MOVE THE SERVER BACK TO SANTA MONICA SO I CAN PLAY ON NA WITH 150 PING TY. AUSTRALIAN/KIWI GAMERS DO NOT GIVE A FK ABOUT IMPROVING AND MORE CONCERNED ABOUT WHO TALKS SHIT TO THEM IN GAME, SO THEY SIT AT THEIR COMPUTER WASTING THEIR LIFE INTING A GAME OVER WORDS. 
I'M NOT RACIST, I'M AUSTRALIAN MYSELF AND ASHAMED OF WORK CULTURE. ITS SO EMBARRASING

replies.body: Go outside, get some sun, stop playing so much it's affecting your mental health. Also don't you dare touch my 17 ping.
